column2:
t <- data.frame(landlord_size = c("Small", "Small", "Medium", "Medium", "Medium", "Large", "Large"), 
                units_owned = c("1-2", "3-4", "5-10", "11-30", "31-50", "51-100", "More than 100"),
                pct_behind = c("29%", "35%", "51%", "67%", "73%", "88%", "93%"),
                median_arrears = c("$12,000", "$12,000", "$12,000", "$20,000", "$30,000", "$60,000", "$143,000")) %>%
  group_by(landlord_size) %>%
   kable(caption = "Table 6. Rent arrears by the number of units owned by the landlord") %>%
  row_spec(1:2, background = "lightgray") %>%  # Apply striped background to first two rows
  row_spec(6:7, background = "lightgray")  %>%
    kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("hover"), full_width = FALSE)

Error in kable_styling(., bootstrap_options = c("hover"), full_width = FALSE) : 
  could not find function "kable_styling"
